mapper.select: select * from timeslot where timeSlotDate > #{startDate} and timeSlotStatus = 'FREE'
SELECT * from timeSlot where timeSlotDate = #{date} order by slot
mapper.insert: insert into timeSlot(timeSlotDate, slot, timeSlotStatus) values (#{timeSlot.timeSlotDate}, #{timeSlot.slot}, #{timeSlot.timeSlotStatus})
mapper.select: select * from timeslot order by timeSlotId desc limit 1

select user.firstName, user.lastName, user.email, timeSlot.timeSlotId, timeSlot.timeSlotDate, timeSlot.slot from timeSlot left join appointment on timeSlot.timeSlotId = appointment.timeSlotId left join user on appointment.userId = user.userId where timeSlot.timeSlotStatus = 'BOOKED' and user.userId is not NULL order by user.userId

select timeSlot.* from timeSlot left join appointment on timeSlot.timeSlotId = appointment.timeSlotId left join user on appointment.userId = user.userId where timeSlot.timeSlotStatus = 'BOOKED' and user.email = #{email}
